verses.verse: When <S%G1894><s%> He had completed <S%G4137><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> His discourse <S%G4487><s%> in the hearing <S%G189><s%> of the people, <S%G2992><s%> He went <S%G1525><s%> to Capernaum. <S%G2746><s%>

And a certain <S%G5100><s%> centurion's slave, <S%G1401><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> was highly <S%G1784><s%> regarded <S%G1784><s%> by him, was sick <S%G2560><s%> and about <S%G3195><s%> to die. <S%G5053><s%>

And when he heard <S%G191><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> some Jewish <S%G2453><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> asking <S%G2065><s%> Him to come <S%G2064><s%> and save <S%G1295><s%> the life <S%G1295><s%> of his slave. <S%G1401><s%>

And when they had come <S%G3854><s%> to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> they earnestly <S%G4709><s%> entreated <S%G3870><s%> Him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "He is worthy <S%G514><s%> for You to grant <S%G3930><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> to him;
for he loves <S%G25><s%> our nation, <S%G1484><s%> and it was he who built <S%G3618><s%> us our synagogue. <S%G4864><s%> "

Now <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> [started] on His way <S%G4198><s%> with them; and when He was already <S%G2235><s%> not far <S%G3112><s%> from the house, <S%G3614><s%> the centurion <S%G1543><s%> sent <S%G3992><s%> friends, <S%G5384><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> do not trouble <S%G4660><s%> Yourself further, for I am <S%G1510><s%> not worthy <S%G2425><s%> for You to come <S%G1525><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> my roof; <S%G4721><s%>

for this <S%G1352><s%> reason <S%G1352><s%> I did not even <S%G3761><s%> consider <S%G515><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> worthy <S%G515><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to You, but [just] say <S%G3004><s%> the word, <S%G3056><s%> and my servant <S%G3816><s%> will be healed. <S%G2390><s%>

"For I, too, <S%G2532><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> authority, <S%G1849><s%> with soldiers <S%G4757><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> me; and I say <S%G3004><s%> to this <S%G3778><s%> one, <S%G3778><s%> 'Go! <S%G4198><s%>' and he goes; <S%G4198><s%> and to another, <S%G243><s%> 'Come! <S%G2064><s%>' and he comes; <S%G2064><s%> and to my slave, <S%G1401><s%> 'Do <S%G4160><s%> this! <S%G3778><s%>' and he does <S%G4160><s%> it."

Now <S%G1161><s%> when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> He marveled <S%G2296><s%> at him, and turned <S%G4762><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to the multitude <S%G3793><s%> that was following <S%G190><s%> Him, "I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, not even <S%G3761><s%> in Israel <S%G2474><s%> have I found <S%G2147><s%> such <S%G5118><s%> great <S%G5118><s%> faith. <S%G4102><s%>"

And when those <S%G3588><s%> who had been sent <S%G3992><s%> returned <S%G5290><s%> to the house, <S%G3624><s%> they found <S%G2147><s%> the slave <S%G1401><s%> in good <S%G5198><s%> health. <S%G5198><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> about soon <S%G1836><s%> afterwards, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1836><s%> that He went <S%G4198><s%> to a city <S%G4172><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> Nain; <S%G3484><s%> and His disciples <S%G3101><s%> were going <S%G4848><s%> along <S%G4848><s%> with Him, accompanied <S%G2532><s%> by a large <S%G4183><s%> multitude. <S%G3793><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> as He approached <S%G1448><s%> the gate <S%G4439><s%> of the city, <S%G4172><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> a dead <S%G2348><s%> man was being carried <S%G1580><s%> out, the only <S%G3439><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> of his mother, <S%G3384><s%> and she was a widow; <S%G5503><s%> and a sizeable <S%G2425><s%> crowd <S%G3793><s%> from the city <S%G4172><s%> was with her.
And when the Lord <S%G2962><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> her, He felt <S%G4697><s%> compassion <S%G4697><s%> for her, and said <S%G3004><s%> to her, "Do not weep2799."

And He came <S%G4334><s%> up and touched <S%G681><s%> the coffin; <S%G4673><s%> and the bearers <S%G941><s%> came <S%G2476><s%> to a halt. <S%G2476><s%> And He said, <S%G3004><s%> "Young <S%G3495><s%> man, <S%G3495><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, arise! <S%G1453><s%>"
And the dead <S%G3498><s%> man <S%G3498><s%> sat <S%G339><s%> up, and began <S%G757><s%> to speak. <S%G2980><s%> And [Jesus] gave <S%G1325><s%> him back to his mother. <S%G3384><s%>

And fear <S%G5401><s%> gripped <S%G2983><s%> them all, <S%G3956><s%> and they [began] glorifying <S%G1392><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "A great <S%G3173><s%> prophet <S%G4396><s%> has arisen <S%G1453><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> us!" and, "God <S%G2316><s%> has visited <S%G1980><s%> His people! <S%G2992><s%>"

And this <S%G3778><s%> report <S%G3056><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> Him went <S%G1831><s%> out all <S%G3650><s%> over <S%G1722><s%> Judea, <S%G2453><s%> and in all <S%G3956><s%> the surrounding <S%G4066><s%> district. <S%G4066><s%>
And the disciples <S%G3101><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%> reported <S%G518><s%> to him about <S%G4012><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things. <S%G3778><s%>

And summoning <S%G4341><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> of his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> sent <S%G3992><s%> them to the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Are You the Expected <S%G2064><s%> One, or <S%G2228><s%> do we look <S%G4328><s%> for someone <S%G243><s%> else <S%G243><s%>?"

And when the men <S%G435><s%> had come <S%G3854><s%> to Him, they said, <S%G3004><s%> "John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist <S%G910><s%> has sent <S%G649><s%> us to You, saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'Are You the Expected <S%G2064><s%> One, or <S%G2228><s%> do we look <S%G4328><s%> for someone <S%G243><s%> else <S%G243><s%>?'"

At that very time <S%G5610><s%> He cured <S%G2323><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> [people] of diseases <S%G3554><s%> and afflictions <S%G3148><s%> and evil <S%G4190><s%> spirits; <S%G4151><s%> and He granted <S%G5483><s%> sight <S%G991><s%> to many <S%G4183><s%> [who were] blind. <S%G5185><s%>

And He answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Go <S%G4198><s%> and report <S%G518><s%> to John <S%G2491><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> you have seen <S%G3708><s%> and heard: <S%G191><s%> [the] blind <S%G5185><s%> receive <S%G308><s%> sight, <S%G308><s%> [the] lame <S%G5560><s%> walk, <S%G4043><s%> [the] lepers <S%G3015><s%> are cleansed, <S%G2511><s%> and [the] deaf <S%G2974><s%> hear, <S%G191><s%> [the] dead <S%G3498><s%> are raised <S%G1453><s%> up, [the] poor <S%G4434><s%> have the gospel <S%G2097><s%> preached <S%G2097><s%> to them.
"And blessed <S%G3107><s%> is he who <S%G3739><s%> keeps <S%G3361><s%> from stumbling <S%G4624><s%> over <S%G1722><s%> Me."

And when the messengers <S%G32><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%> had left, <S%G565><s%> He began <S%G757><s%> to speak <S%G3004><s%> to the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> did you go <S%G1831><s%> out into the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> to look <S%G2300><s%> at? A reed <S%G2563><s%> shaken <S%G4531><s%> by the wind <S%G417><s%>?

"But what <S%G5101><s%> did you go <S%G1831><s%> out to see <S%G3708><s%>? A man <S%G444><s%> dressed <S%G294><s%> in soft <S%G3120><s%> clothing <S%G2440><s%>? Behold, <S%G2400><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who are splendidly <S%G1741><s%> clothed <S%G2441><s%> and live <S%G5225><s%> in luxury <S%G5172><s%> are [found] in royal <S%G934><s%> palaces. <S%G933><s%>

"But what <S%G5101><s%> did you go <S%G1831><s%> out to see <S%G3708><s%>? A prophet <S%G4396><s%>? Yes, <S%G3483><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, and one who is more <S%G4053><s%> than a prophet. <S%G4396><s%>

"This <S%G3778><s%> is the one about <S%G4012><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> 'Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I send <S%G649><s%> My messenger <S%G32><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> Your face, <S%G4383><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> will prepare <S%G2680><s%> Your way <S%G3598><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> You.'

" I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, among <S%G1722><s%> those born <S%G1084><s%> of women, <S%G1135><s%> there is no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> greater <S%G3173><s%> than John; <S%G2491><s%> yet <S%G1161><s%> he who is least <S%G3398><s%> in the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is greater <S%G3173><s%> than he."

And when all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> and the tax-gatherers heard <S%G191><s%> [this,] they acknowledged <S%G1344><s%> God's justice, <S%G1344><s%> having been baptized <S%G907><s%> with the baptism <S%G908><s%> of John. <S%G2491><s%>
But the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and the lawyers <S%G3544><s%> rejected <S%G114><s%> God's purpose <S%G1012><s%> for themselves, <S%G1438><s%> not having been baptized <S%G907><s%> by John.
"To what <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> shall I compare <S%G3666><s%> the men <S%G444><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> generation, <S%G1074><s%> and what <S%G5101><s%> are they like <S%G3664><s%>?

"They are like <S%G3664><s%> children <S%G3813><s%> who sit <S%G2521><s%> in the market <S%G58><s%> place <S%G58><s%> and call <S%G4377><s%> to one <S%G240><s%> another; <S%G240><s%> and they say, <S%G3004><s%> 'We played <S%G832><s%> the flute <S%G832><s%> for you, and you did not dance; <S%G3738><s%> we sang <S%G2354><s%> a dirge, <S%G2354><s%> and you did not weep. <S%G2799><s%>'

" For John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist <S%G910><s%> has come <S%G2064><s%> eating <S%G2068><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> and drinking <S%G4095><s%> no <S%G3383><s%> wine; <S%G3631><s%> and you say, <S%G3004><s%> 'He has <S%G2192><s%> a demon! <S%G1140><s%>'

"The Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> has come <S%G2064><s%> eating <S%G2068><s%> and drinking; <S%G4095><s%> and you say, <S%G3004><s%> 'Behold, <S%G2400><s%> a gluttonous <S%G5314><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> and a drunkard, <S%G3630><s%> a friend <S%G5384><s%> of tax-gatherers and sinners! <S%G268><s%>'
"Yet <S%G2532><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> is vindicated <S%G1344><s%> by all <S%G3956><s%> her children. <S%G5043><s%>"

Now <S%G1161><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> was requesting <S%G2065><s%> Him to dine <S%G2068><s%> with him. And He entered <S%G1525><s%> the Pharisee's house, <S%G3624><s%> and reclined <S%G2625><s%> [at the table.]

And behold, <S%G2400><s%> there was a woman <S%G1135><s%> in the city <S%G4172><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> was a sinner; <S%G268><s%> and when she learned <S%G1921><s%> that He was reclining <S%G2621><s%> [at the table] in the Pharisee's house, <S%G3614><s%> she brought <S%G2865><s%> an alabaster <S%G211><s%> vial <S%G211><s%> of perfume, <S%G3464><s%>

and standing <S%G2476><s%> behind <S%G3694><s%> [Him] at His feet, <S%G4228><s%> weeping, <S%G2799><s%> she began <S%G757><s%> to wet <S%G1026><s%> His feet <S%G4228><s%> with her tears, <S%G1144><s%> and kept wiping <S%G1591><s%> them with the hair <S%G2359><s%> of her head, <S%G2776><s%> and kissing <S%G2705><s%> His feet, <S%G4228><s%> and anointing <S%G218><s%> them with the perfume. <S%G3464><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when the Pharisee <S%G5330><s%> who had invited <S%G2564><s%> Him saw <S%G3708><s%> this, he said <S%G3004><s%> to himself, <S%G1438><s%> "If <S%G1487><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G3778><s%> were a prophet <S%G4396><s%> He would know <S%G1097><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> and what <S%G4217><s%> sort <S%G4217><s%> of person <S%G4217><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%> is who <S%G3748><s%> is touching <S%G681><s%> Him, that she is a sinner. <S%G268><s%>"

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Simon, <S%G4613><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> something <S%G5100><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> to you." And he replied, <S%G5346><s%> "Say <S%G3004><s%> it, Teacher. <S%G1320><s%>"

"A certain <S%G5100><s%> moneylender <S%G1157><s%> had <S%G1510><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> debtors: <S%G5533><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> owed <S%G3784><s%> five <S%G4001><s%> hundred <S%G4001><s%> denarii, <S%G1220><s%> and the other <S%G2087><s%> fifty. <S%G4004><s%>

"When they were unable <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2192><s%> to repay, <S%G591><s%> he graciously <S%G5483><s%> forgave <S%G5483><s%> them both. <S%G297><s%> Which <S%G5101><s%> of them therefore <S%G3767><s%> will love <S%G25><s%> him more <S%G4183><s%>?"

Simon <S%G4613><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "I suppose <S%G5274><s%> the one whom <S%G3739><s%> he forgave <S%G5483><s%> more. <S%G4183><s%>" And He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "You have judged <S%G2919><s%> correctly. <S%G3723><s%>"

And turning <S%G4762><s%> toward <S%G4314><s%> the woman, <S%G1135><s%> He said <S%G5346><s%> to Simon, <S%G4613><s%> "Do you see <S%G991><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%>? I entered <S%G1525><s%> your house; <S%G3614><s%> you gave <S%G1325><s%> Me no <S%G3756><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> for My feet, <S%G4228><s%> but she has wet <S%G1026><s%> My feet <S%G4228><s%> with her tears, <S%G1144><s%> and wiped <S%G1591><s%> them with her hair. <S%G2359><s%>
"You gave <S%G1325><s%> Me no <S%G3756><s%> kiss; <S%G5370><s%> but she, since <S%G575><s%> the time I came <S%G1525><s%> in, has not ceased <S%G1257><s%> to kiss <S%G2705><s%> My feet. <S%G4228><s%>
"You did not anoint <S%G218><s%> My head <S%G2776><s%> with oil, <S%G1637><s%> but she anointed <S%G218><s%> My feet <S%G4228><s%> with perfume. <S%G3464><s%>

" For this <S%G3739><s%> reason <S%G5484><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, her sins, <S%G266><s%> which are many, <S%G4183><s%> have been forgiven, <S%G863><s%> for she loved <S%G25><s%> much; <S%G4183><s%> but he who <S%G3739><s%> is forgiven <S%G863><s%> little, <S%G3641><s%> loves <S%G25><s%> little. <S%G3641><s%>"
And He said <S%G3004><s%> to her, "Your sins <S%G266><s%> have been forgiven. <S%G863><s%>"

And those <S%G3588><s%> who were reclining <S%G4873><s%> [at the table] with Him began <S%G757><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> to themselves, <S%G1438><s%> "Who <S%G5101><s%> is this <S%G3778><s%> [man] who <S%G3739><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> forgives <S%G863><s%> sins <S%G266><s%>?"
And He said <S%G3004><s%> to the woman, <S%G1135><s%> "Your faith <S%G4102><s%> has saved <S%G4982><s%> you; go <S%G4198><s%> in peace. <S%G1515><s%>"
